Detailed Description

GameData represents DragonTool game data storage class.

This class used to import DragoTool game data resource file.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

~GameData (   ) 
 

GameData class destructor.

Free all memory used to store game data.

Member Function Documentation

Bool EnterNode (   ) 
 

Try to enter in current node on one level deeper.

After successful entrance top first node becomes the current node.

Returns:
Returns True, if success enter, else - False.

Bool ExportNode (  TileMap *  tile_map  ) 
 

Export TileMap class object from current node.

Parameters:
tile_map pointer to store exported TileMap class object.
Returns:
Return True if export success else False.

Bool ExportNode (  vector< SpriteTransform * > *  st_export,
SVector< SpriteTransform > *  st_table,
SVector< CustomData > *  cd_table,
Char **  tokens
) 
 

Export SpriteTransform class objects from current node.

Parameters:
st_export pointer to vector class object. This vector class object will be store only pointers on exported SpriteTransform class objects.
st_table pointer to SVector class object. All exported SpriteTransform class objects will be created in this unmovable vector.
cd_table pointer to SVector class object. All exported CustomData class objects will be created in this unmovable vector.
tokens pointer to ASCII names identifications for CustomData class objects tokens. See CustomData token.
Returns:
Return True if export success else False.

Bool GoToNextByNameNode (  const Char *  name_  ) 
 

Try to go from current to bottom node without deep entering (do search only on current level) and stop on first node with equal specified ASCII name.

Returns:
Returns True if node success found else False.

Bool GoToNextNode (   ) 
 

Try to go to next node.

Returns:
Returns True, if success, else - False.

Bool GoToParentNode (   ) 
 

Try to go up on one level upper.

After successful rise parent (the node we last enter) node becomes the current node.

Returns:
Returns True, if success enter, else - False.

Bool GoToPreviousNode (   ) 
 

Try to go to previous node.

Returns:
Returns True, if success, else - False.

Bool Init (  Render2D *  render_,
Char *  name_
) 
 

Performs the complete initialization of game data resource file class object.

This function must be called before any operations on game data resource file class object.

Parameters:
render pointer to Render2D class object.
name_ pointer to ASCII name for specified game data resource file to load. Do not add file extension ".dt" to this name.
Returns:
Return True if specified game data resource file load complete successfully else False.
